lore: Once the graceful guardians of the forest, the Corrupted Dryads now bear a twisted visage, consumed by darkness and despair. Once embodying nature's harmony and beauty, they have succumbed to corruption, their essence tainted by an unknown malevolence. Their once melodious voices now echo with haunting wails, and their graceful movements have been replaced by unsettling contortions. Beware their deceitful allure, for they will stop at nothing to lure unsuspecting wanderers into their sinister grasp. Redemption seems but a distant memory as they cling desperately to their fading connection with the natural world.

abilities.title: Arboreal Fangs
abilities.lore: Nature's teeth rend with twisted malice.

abilities.lore: Life's essence drained, hope withers away.

abilities.title: Shadowed Annihilation
abilities.description: Mass attack. For each enemy, 5 random positions are chosen. Every skill tile at the position is destroyed. Dryad deals dark damage for every undestroyed tile this way
abilities.lore: Darkness descends, consuming all in its path.
